text: Eric Lynn Johnson (born October 10, 1975) is an American politician and lawyer. He became the 62nd Mayor of Dallas, Texas in 2019. He was a Democratic member of the Texas House of Representatives, where he represented District 100 in the cities of Dallas and Mesquite, Texas. In 2023, he switched parties and became a Republican. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Dallas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians
title: Eric Johnson (Texas politician)
